Have a look at this: https://github.com/anubisg1/cisco-vxlan-evpn-ansible

i did extensive work to simplify/standardize as much as possible the configuration as well as abstract the whole thing. we use this in our production.

i haven't seen a bridge domain configuration requirement in a long long time .

the above is used on catalyst 9k (93 and 95) on ios-xe version >= 17.03 for leafs or >= 17.11 for the spines ( required by the dynamic peering configuration )
